channel.title: A big problem

item.title: A big problem
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

ok guys, well the source i have has got PVP and IsinWilderness
now i have a problem the PVP is everywere and so is wildy i messed around with the true and false after each type and for each boolean and now the PVP area is SAFE and is around every area that should be safe but where the wildy is the PVP Text Disappears but you cant attack so its safe, how can i fix this any ideas.

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) || (coordY >= 3487) && (coordY <= 3489) && (coordX <= 2727) && (coordX >= 2724) || (coordY >= 4996) && (coordY <= 5008) && (coordX <= 1977) && (coordX >= 1971) || (coordY >= 5340) && (coordY <= 5355) && (coordX <= 1868) && (coordX >= 1859) || (coordY >= 4952) && (coordY <= 4970) && (coordX <= 2377) && (coordX >= 2359)) { return false; } return true; }

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || (absX >= 2366 && absX <= 2431 && absY >= 3071 && absY <=3137) || (absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548) || (absX >= 2897 && absX <= 2926 && absY >= 3595 && absY <=3628 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257)) { return true; } } else if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true;
